Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

FetchNodes()

Fetches every Node Declaration in the assembly and stores them in the nodes List. nodes List contains a default instance of each node type in the key and editor specific NodeData in the value

Declaration
public static void FetchNodes()

getDefaultNode(String)

Returns the default node from the given nodeID. The default node is a dummy used to create other nodes (Due to various limitations creation has to be performed on Node instances)

Declaration
